purpose: Facilitates the understanding and analysis of AI agent security through threat modeling and visualization.
principle: Integrates with frameworks like LangGraph, AutoGen, and CrewAI to provide a CLI for visualizing and assessing AI agent security.
reusability: Offers a command-line interface that can be integrated into existing security workflows for AI agents, with support for multiple frameworks.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for non-listed frameworks and potential bugs.
name: Agent-Wiz
description: A CLI tool for threat modeling and visualizing AI agents built using popular frameworks like LangGraph, AutoGen, CrewAI, and more.
highlight: Enables threat modeling and visualization of AI agents across multiple popular frameworks.
